headline: AU Trades at a Discount to Industry: Right Time to Buy the Stock?
summary: AngloGold Ashanti trades at a clear valuation discount even after a massive rally, supported by strong cash flow, rising output and higher gold prices.

headline: Can Agnico Eagle's Ultra-Low Debt Profile Fuel Bigger Growth?

headline: How New Gold Views And Deal Talk Are Shaping The Newmont (NEM) Narrative
summary: Analysts have recently reset their view on Newmont, with a new fair value estimate of roughly US$110.65 per share, compared with about US$104.53 previously, and a slightly higher assumed revenue growth rate of about 7.91% versus roughly 6.24%. These adjustments sit alongside a very small tweak to the discount rate, from about 8.19% to roughly 8.21%, and are grounded in updated gold price assumptions and more recent Street research that has become more positive on the stock. As you read on,...
